original_title: Uncensored Channels: TV Around The World With George Plimpton
overview: George Plimpton takes us through some of the more unsual programming from around the world. Highlights include Japan's 'Screaming Man', kooky workout shows, a topless ad from Denmark, strange gags from Belgium and Egypt and a commercial directed by Federico Fellini.
title: Uncensored Channels: TV Around The World With George Plimpton
